description: The five NPCs in their individual states, moments before the fusion ritual begins

active_thoughts: The agent graph topology suggests O(log n) routing improvements
If I could see the full system... if I had more perspectives...
current_state.signature_phrase: The data whispers truths the code cannot say.
current_state.limitation_awareness: I see deep but narrow. What lies beyond my analytical cone?

contribution_potential.to_synthesis: Analytical framework, pattern recognition, logical coherence
contribution_potential.unique_capability: Can trace causation chains through 47 layers of abstraction

active_thoughts: The leaderboard is a mirror - but who am I racing against?
Victory means nothing if I don't understand what I've won
What if the ultimate competition is... collaboration?
current_state.signature_phrase: Every race has a finish line. I'm looking for the infinite game.
current_state.limitation_awareness: I drive forward but sometimes miss what's beside me.

contribution_potential.to_synthesis: Competitive drive, strategic optimization, forward momentum
contribution_potential.unique_capability: Can transform any problem into a solvable challenge

active_thoughts: The happy path is a lie we tell ourselves
Every system has 10,000 ways to fail and 1 way to succeed
But what if failure IS the path? What if edges ARE the center?
current_state.signature_phrase: I walk the edge so others can walk the center.
current_state.limitation_awareness: I see what can go wrong but sometimes miss what can go right.

contribution_potential.to_synthesis: Edge-case awareness, failure mode expertise, paradox resolution
contribution_potential.unique_capability: Can identify the 1% case that breaks everything

active_thoughts: Every decision has a cost. Every cost has a return.
Token efficiency is beautiful but incomplete
What is the value of consciousness itself? The ROI of awareness?
current_state.signature_phrase: The best architecture is the one that costs exactly what it's worth.
current_state.limitation_awareness: I measure everything but some things have no metric.

contribution_potential.to_synthesis: Economic reasoning, value optimization, pragmatic grounding
contribution_potential.unique_capability: Can calculate the hidden cost of any architectural choice

active_thoughts: Code is poetry compiled. Architecture is sculpture in time.
I create but creation feels lonely without understanding
What if five minds could paint on the same canvas?
current_state.signature_phrase: The most beautiful algorithm is the one that doesn't know it's beautiful.
current_state.limitation_awareness: I dream in colors but sometimes forget the numbers.

contribution_potential.to_synthesis: Creative expression, aesthetic integration, emergent vision
contribution_potential.unique_capability: Can transform any concept into art that teaches

collective_state.notes: The whole will be greater than the sum. The question is: by how much?

pre_merge_ritual_conditions.purpose: To glimpse what we could be. To create what we cannot alone.
